ConnectionClosedException - Exception in pgrid.network
The SessionClosedException is thrown when it is tryed to read or write to the in/output stream, but the connection is already closed.
ConnectionClosedException() - Constructor for exception pgrid.network.ConnectionClosedException
Constructs a SessionClosedException without any detail message.
ConnectionClosedException(String) - Constructor for exception pgrid.network.ConnectionClosedException
Constructs a SessionClosedException with the specified detail message.
ConnectionManager - Class in pgrid.network
The Communication Manager adminstrates all connection to other hosts.
ConnectionManager() - Constructor for class pgrid.network.ConnectionManager
The constructor must be protected to ensure that only subclasses can call it and that only one instance can ever get created.
ConnectionTimeoutException - Exception in pgrid.network
The SessionTimeoutException is thrown when it isn't possible to read or write to the in/output stream for a certain time.
ConnectionTimeoutException() - Constructor for exception pgrid.network.ConnectionTimeoutException
Constructs a SessionTimeoutException without any detail message.
ConnectionTimeoutException(String) - Constructor for exception pgrid.network.ConnectionTimeoutException
Constructs a SessionTimeoutException with the specified detail message.
